title: Grain Storage | Grain Bags and Bunkers

tasks.task: Preparing and selecting sites for grain bags and bunkers
subtasks: Ensuring high ground with slight slope
Away from trees, sand hills, and grassy areas
Cleaning up spills and mouse baits
Properly sealing the starting and ending ends of the bags or bunker
Avoiding storing grain in bags for extended periods

tasks.task: Loading and unloading grain from bags and bunkers
subtasks: Ensuring correct stretch when filling bags
Straightening the bag to prevent creases
Using clamps and dirt to secure the ends
Using loaders or augers for unloading
Sealing the bag or bunker completely
Venting the fumigant after the required period
Allocating sufficient labor for maintenance tasks
Using appropriate equipment for loading, unloading, and fumigation
